section.section: The term of a member appointed under subsection (a)(9), (10), or (11) of this section is 3 years.
An appointed member may serve up to two consecutive 3-year terms.
In case of a vacancy, the Governor shall appoint a successor for the remainder of the unexpired term.

text.section: All other members of the Council shall continue in office so long as they hold the required qualification and designation specified in subsection (a)(1) through (8) of this section.
